descriptions: Student is unable to identify any personal stressors.

Student identifies several personal stressors and makes a reasonable connection to personal patterns.
Student clearly and accurately identifies multiple personal stressors and explains how they relate to personal patterns of response.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of personal stressors and their deep impact on personal patterns, demonstrating keen self-awareness.
